mapper.delete: delete from student where stuId=#{stuId} and stuStatus!='在读'
mapper.select: select count(stuId) from student where stuStatus='在读'
mapper.update: update student set stuStatus='毕业' where classId=#{classId}
mapper.select: select s.stuId,s.stuName,s.stuSex,s.stuAge,c.className,g.groupName,s.stuTel,s.stuStatus from staff sta inner join givelessons gi on sta.staffId=gi.staffId inner join class c on gi.classId=c.classId inner join student s on c.classId=s.classId inner join groups g on s.groupId=g.groupId where sta.staffTel=#{staffTel}
